title: Mini Project Doubt
content: I am in 1st sem rn, can we use pygame for the mini project? Or should we just stick to the syllabus

comments.body: It's best if you ask your teacher. Some teachers might appreciate your efforts (to explore) while others might dislike it.
Yes you can I did ask my Python teacher she said it doesnt matter what module you use as long as your prog has a GUI and its in Python and not any other prog lang.
